code.value:
match (n)-[r]->(m)
where r. capacity =20000
return n,r,m;

match (n)-[r]->(m)
where r. capacity =20000
with sum(r.capacity)/100000000.0 as btc_capacity, n, count(n) as chans
return DISTINCT n.alias,chans, btc_capacity
ORDER by btc_capacity DESC;

MATCH 
(kraken {pubkey: "02f1a8c87607f415c8f22c00593002775941dea48869ce23096af27b0cfdcc0b69"})-[r]->
(m)-[s]->
(loop {pubkey:"021c97a90a411ff2b10dc2a8e32de2f29d2fa49d41bfbb52bd416e460db0747d0d"})
WHERE 
  r.capacity > 25000000
Return kraken,r,m,s,loop;

MATCH 
(kraken {pubkey: "02f1a8c87607f415c8f22c00593002775941dea48869ce23096af27b0cfdcc0b69"})-[r]->
(m)-[s]->
(loop {pubkey:"021c97a90a411ff2b10dc2a8e32de2f29d2fa49d41bfbb52bd416e460db0747d0d"})
WHERE 
  r.capacity >= 25000000
  and r.fee_rate_milli_msat < 2500
RETURN kraken.alias, r.fee_rate_milli_msat, m.alias, s.fee_rate_milli_msat, loop.alias, (r.fee_rate_milli_msat/1e6 +1)*(s.fee_rate_milli_msat/1e6+1)*1e6-1e6 AS total_fee_rate
ORDER BY total_fee_rate ASC;

MATCH (k {pubkey:"02f1a8c87607f415c8f22c00593002775941dea48869ce23096af27b0cfdcc0b69"})-[r]->(b)-[rev]->(k)
WHERE r.fee_rate_milli_msat = 2500
  AND rev.capacity > 50000000

WITH
    b.alias            AS alias,
    count(*)           AS edge_count,
    avg(rev.fee_rate_milli_msat)          AS avg_ppm,
    sum(rev.capacity) / 1e8               AS num_bitcoin,
    avg(rev.fee_rate_milli_msat) * sum(rev.capacity) / 1e6 AS total_fees

RETURN
    alias,
    edge_count,
    avg_ppm,
    num_bitcoin,
    total_fees
ORDER BY total_fees ASCENDING;

MATCH (k {pubkey:"02f1a8c87607f415c8f22c00593002775941dea48869ce23096af27b0cfdcc0b69"})-[r]->(b)-[rev]->(k)
WHERE r.fee_rate_milli_msat = 2500
  AND rev.capacity > 50000000

return k,rev,b;
